sentences.en: Artie treated most women with indifference.
sentences.cn: 阿蒂对待大多数女性颇为冷淡。

sentences.en: He should be allowed the occasional treat.
sentences.cn: 应该准许他偶尔也轻松一下。

sentences.en: Her cousin, a hairdresser, was perming her hair as a special treat.
sentences.cn: 她表兄是美发师，正在免费给她烫发。

sentences.en: It was difficult to treat patients because of a shortage of medicine.
sentences.cn: 由于缺少药物，很难给病人治病。

sentences.en: It's a treat to be enjoyed all the year round.
sentences.cn: 这是全年都能享受到的款待。

sentences.en: Let's go out for lunch─ my treat (= I will pay) .
sentences.cn: 咱们到外面去吃午餐，我请客。

sentences.en: Lettie had never yet failed to return from town without some special treat for him.
sentences.cn: 莱蒂每次从城里回来都要带一些特别的礼物送给他。

sentences.en: New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers.
sentences.cn: 关节炎的新疗法可能是止痛药之外的另一种选择。

sentences.en: No one knew how to treat this dreaded disease.
sentences.cn: 没人知道如何治疗这种可怕的疾病。

sentences.en: People think they can treat me like dirt!
sentences.cn: 人们以为可以视我为草芥！

sentences.en: sewage treated so that it can be used as fertilizer
sentences.cn: 经过处理可用作肥料的污水

sentences.en: She adored Paddy but he didn't treat her well.
sentences.cn: 她深爱帕迪，但他对她却并不好。

sentences.en: She treats me like one of the family.
sentences.cn: 她把我当作家人看待。

sentences.en: The allies say they will treat their prisoners decently.
sentences.cn: 同盟国称他们将善待战俘。

sentences.en: The apricots would go down a treat.
sentences.cn: 杏会非常好吃。

sentences.en: The best way to treat such bleeding is to apply firm pressure.
sentences.cn: 治疗这种流血的最好方法就是牢牢将伤口压住。

sentences.en: Their main job is to preserve health rather than treat illness.
sentences.cn: 它们的主要功效是保健而非治病。

sentences.en: their tactics worked a treat.
sentences.cn: 他们的策略太出色了。

sentences.en: They shouldn't treat their mother in this disrespectful way.
sentences.cn: 他们不能这样无礼地对待亲生母亲。

sentences.en: Tomorrow I'll treat myself to a day's gardening.
sentences.cn: 明天我将犒劳一下自己——享受一天的园艺乐趣。

sentences.en: Too many airlines treat our children as second-class citizens.
sentences.cn: 太多的航空公司把我们的孩子当作二等公民对待。

sentences.en: Treat any tender points by massaging.
sentences.cn: 用按摩法治疗疼痛部位。

sentences.en: We treated Mom to lunch at the Savoy.
sentences.cn: 我们请妈妈在萨沃伊酒店吃午饭。

sentences.en: When we were kids, a trip to the beach was a real treat .
sentences.cn: 我们小时候，到海滩去玩是件特别开心的事。

phrases.tran_cn: 各付己帐；各自付帐的聚餐或娱乐活动
不招待就使坏（指万圣节孩子们挨家逐户要糖果等礼物，如不遂愿便恶作剧一番的风俗）

trans.tran_en: something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

trans.tran_cn: 对待，看待，治疗，处理，请客，招待
trans.tran_en: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way

trans.tran_cn: 对待， 处理； 医疗， 医治； 款待， 招待； 探讨， 讨论
